register.geoText: In order to put your pictures on our Discovery map, we would need to use your location.
register.reminder: Would you like us to remind you to go on walks on certain days?

badges.noMessage: You didn\'t receive this badge yet

comments.message: There seems to be nothing here. Tell your friends about your post!

errorMessages.message: Something went wrong connection to the server.

feedPage.message: Go make some friends so you can enjoy there discoveries!
feedPage.header: Your friends discoveries will show up here

friendsPage.friendReqMes: New friend requests will show up here

postContent.headerDel: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
postContent.messageDel: This action can not be undone and your friends can't see your awesome picture anymore :(

share.picHead: Add some nice pictures to your discovery!
share.picMess: You can add up to 5 pictures. The last one show in the leaf on the feed.
share.leafMess:
This leaf shape will show up in your friends feed, so be sure to take a nice one that complements your first
picture.
share.tagMess: Tagged friends will show up here
share.cancelMess:
Are you sure you want to stop sharing your discovery? The plant will still show up in your wiki, but your
friends won't see it.

prContent.messagePh: You don't have any discoveries yet! Be sure to go out in nature and make some snaps of nice plants!
prContent.messageTg: None of your friends have tagged you yet :( Be sure to go out and explore with your friends

snap.message: You can add up to 5 pictures to scan
